question: I've had type 1 for 8 months for the last 2 months I haven't taken insulin and I use meth everyday I just watch my diet somewhat and it never gets higher then 130 but usually is 100 or 110 and when I was taking my insulin I had a problem with it getting too low.is it possible the meth acts as a type of insulin cause my problem is mine gets too high
title: meth use and type 1 diabetes
